divs: Sighting DetailsENTER i was sitting in the yard appr. 6 oclock in the evening. cant really saywhy but suddenly look straight up. the object was close seemed too be two diskjoined ih the center. ther were glowing edges one side was dark pink, the otherdisk edge was red. my first inpression was power being used to ballance theobject. been watching all ufo shows since to see if it had been seen orexplained since. the object rose straight up there was never any sound ordisturbance to anything.object simply became too small too see . as it rose itbecame like a bright light..)Please limit your narrative to 500 words(equivalent to 1 typed page).
Summary: near sighting of underside of ufo two circles join
